section.p:
thoir ... slat ... takes/brings/gives a rod –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. Thug Seumas leis an t-slat-iasgaich agus thug Màiri leatha biadh ann am bascaid.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. James took the fishing rod with him and Mary took (with her) food in a basket. td. 76

slat iasgaich a fishing rod –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. Thug Seumas leis an t-slat-iasgaich agus thug Màiri leatha biadh ann am bascaid.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. James took the fishing rod with him and Mary took (with her) food in a basket. td. 76
